segments.text: I'm better now . Want to play again ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll let you break the balls this time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let's get all the balls out of the pockets .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . How much do you want to bet on this game ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You are crazy . Gambling is against my principles .
segments.speaker: S1
